tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    is_fraudulent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
    ad_id INT,
    click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    location VARCHAR,
    fraud_flag BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ad_impressions (
    ad_id INT,
    impression_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    location VARCHAR,
    impression_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_activities (
    activity_id INT,
    activity_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    location VARCHAR,
    activity_description VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
  ad_click_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  click_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  fraud_flag BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ad_impressions (
  impression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  impression_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  fraud_flag BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  query_used VARCHAR(255),
  result_count INT,
  flagged_activities TEXT
);
